app.title: Vail Scavenger Hunt
app.description: An interactive couples' date experience exploring romantic locations in Vail

settings.heading: Edit Settings
settings.description: Configure your organization, event, and team information for this scavenger hunt.
settings.eventHelp: Enter the name of your event or occasion
settings.teamHelp: Enter your team or couple name
settings.saveHelp: Save your organization, event, and team settings
settings.cancelHelp: Cancel editing and close settings panel
